title: FunDeSci - Fundraising for Science
description:
FunDeSci offered a new approach to research funding, publishing, and knowledge dissemination. By leveraging blockchain and NFTs, we've created a transparent, accessible, and efficient platform that addresses the challenges in traditional research funding.

Researchers could raise funds through four well-known blockchains including 𝐏𝐨𝐥𝐲𝐠𝐨𝐧, 𝐀𝐫𝐛𝐢𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐦, 𝐁𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐦.

Introduction Video:
